title: Buzz and the Art of Not Trying
plot_outline: Buzz faces a typical day that goes from bad to worse when past mistakes come back to haunt. What starts as a simple attempt to avoid eviction becomes a meditation on the system is rigged as Buzz encounters the usual cast of neighborhood characters and discovers that even small victories come with a price.
